name: Colorful Style v1
description: Vibrant, engaging pictograms using a limited color palette. Maintains clarity while adding visual appeal for younger users and educational contexts.
design_principles: Use color to enhance meaning and engagement
Maintain high contrast ratios (WCAG AA minimum)
Color should support, not replace, shape recognition
prompt_template: Create a clear, colorful pictogram for: '{phrase_spanish}' (English: '{phrase_english}'). Use a limited color palette with 2-3 vibrant colors. Maintain simple shapes with solid fills. Colors should enhance meaning and engagement while preserving recognizability. Suitable for educational AAC contexts. Output as clean SVG.

prompt_parameters.negative_prompt: too many colors, gradients, complex patterns, shadows, 3D effects, text, photorealistic, cluttered

color_usage_guidelines.contrast_requirements: WCAG AA minimum (4.5:1 for text, 3:1 for graphics)
color_usage_guidelines.accessibility_note: Always ensure shape recognition works without color (for colorblind users)

notes: This profile adds visual engagement while maintaining AAC effectiveness. Use for contexts where color adds value (educational settings, younger users) but test grayscale version for accessibility.
